CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In the past few years , spirobifluorene has been used as an ideal building block in construction of stable blue light - emitting materials.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| spirobifluorene |
| stable blue light - emitting materials |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "spirobifluorene" and "stable blue light - emitting materials".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| spirobifluorene |

In this paragraph, the only clear "Material Name" entity is "spirobifluorene". The phrase "stable blue light - emitting materials" is not a clear material name, as it is a description of a type of material rather than a specific name.
